means: <奥义书>（印度教古代吠陀教义的思辩作品，为后世各派印度哲学所依据）

sentence.Network_en: The fairly long Chhandogya - upanishad develops the idea of transmigration of souls.
sentence.Network_cn: 相当长的察汗多雅奥义书发展了灵魂轮回的观念.

sentence.Network_en: The Bhagavad Gita refers to itself as an Upanishad.
sentence.Network_cn: 《博伽梵歌》指出了它自己本身就是一本“奥义书”.

sentence.Network_en: The Katha - upanishad, through the story of Nachiketa, discussed death and the permanence of the soul ( Atman ).
sentence.Network_cn: 卡塔奥义书, 通过尼兹卡塔的故事, 论述了死亡与灵魂 ( 生命的本源,自我 ) 的持久性.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The fairly long Chhandogya - upanishad develops the idea of transmigration of souls ., 相当长的察汗多雅奥义书发展了灵魂轮回的观念.
upandranat 阿谢格, upanishad 陀奥义书, upanisaol 奥义书

list.abs: The fairly long Chhandogya - upanishad develops the idea of transmigration of souls ., 相当长的察汗多雅奥义书发展了灵魂轮回的观念.

means.word_mean: 1. a later sacred text of Hinduism of a mystical nature dealing with metaphysical questions;

sentences.sentence: "the Vedanta philosophy developed from the pantheistic views of the Upanishads"
